scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes four versions. Version 1 (p. 1-13) closely corresponds to published version with slightly different ending; Version 2 (p. 1-12, complete) is a corrected carbon of an earlier draft; Version 3 (p. 2-8) is probably the earliest; and Version 4 as published in Appalachian Heritage.
